DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the Objective Response Rate of KOS-1584, as a single agent in patients with stage IIIB/IV NSCLC whose disease has progressed following initial chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate KOS-1584 in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Stage IIIB/IV Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC)
DOC.criteria: Histologically or cytologically proven NSCLC, Stage IIIB or Stage IV. Eligible patients must have received only one prior chemotherapy regime for Stage IIIB/IV NSCLC. Good performance status. Prior treatment with an epothilone. Known central nervous system (CNS) metastases. Any chemotherapy, radiation therapy or immunotherapy or any investigational agent (therapeutic or diagnostic) within 3 weeks prior to first study drug administration.
DOC.keyword: Patients with Advanced or Metastatic stage IIIB/IV Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
